publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7699 Rob Gibson: The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade—That the Parliament notes with appreciation that the Highlands has been named as one of the top 20 tourist destinations in the world for 2011 by what is considered the prestigious National Geographic Traveler magazine; notes the importance of this accolade in bringing the region to wider world attention and the importance of the tourism industry in the Highlands; understands that the main reasons for it achieving this rating was due to outdoor activities, culture and history as well as scenery, and calls on the Scottish Government to continue its support for tourism in the Highlands and beyond.

S3M-7699 Rob Gibson: The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade—That the Parliament notes with appreciation that the Highlands has been named as one of the top 20 tourist destinations in the world for 2011 by what is considered the prestigious National Geographic Traveler magazine; notes the importance of this accolade in bringing the region to wider world attention and the importance of the tourism industry in the Highlands; understands that the main reasons for it achieving this rating was due to outdoor activities, culture and history as well as scenery, and calls on the Scottish Government to continue its support for tourism in the Highlands and beyond.
S3M-7699 The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade (lodged on 13 January 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*

S3M-7699 The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade (lodged on 13 January 2011) Sandra White*, Bill Kidd*, Maureen Watt*, Jamie McGrigor*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Stuart McMillan*, John Wilson*, Mary Scanlon*, Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Gil Paterson*, Alasdair Allan*, Robin Harper*
S3M-7699 The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade (lodged on 13 January 2011) Bob Doris*
S3M-7699 The Highlands, a World Tourism Destination Accolade (lodged on 13 January 2011) Dave Thompson*
